Super Dungeon Explore: El Rey Olvidado
Super Dungeon Explore: Forgotten King
Super Dungeon Explore: Le Roi Oublié
boardgame.description: Princess Emerald and her companions are questing deep into the Lordship Ruins to confront the evil that resides there. Brooding from his darkened hallways, the Forgotten King is a cursed lord who has pledged himself to the service of the Dark Consul, darkening his once lush and verdant lands. At his side are two new mini-bosses: Trent, a towering guardian of the forest with thick bark and brambles for armor, and Boris, a raging brute with snarling ursine features._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Super Dungeon Explore: Forgotten King, players explore the Fae Wood, home of the Kodama, sentient forest spirits with a taste for adventuring Heroes. Wisps lure Heroes into ensnaring traps as terrifying, man-eating plants sprout from the loamy forest floor to devour them. Continue into the Lordship Ruins where the once proud bramble knights, now corrupted and twisted into servants of the Dark Consul, stalk the stony ruins for any who would defile their lord's holdfast. Don't get too close to the trees, though, as we hear the squirrels are in an ill mood._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Super Dungeon Explore: Forgotten King includes five new Heroes to brave the depths, including the Thundervale Huntress, Fae Alchemist, Royal Warden, and the brave Questing Knight. Each lend a new dynamic to gameplay and your strategy to conquer the Forgotten King and his minions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Forgotten King contains two play modes: Classic Mode, in which someone controls the dungeon and its monsters while everyone else takes the roles of the plucky heroes, or Arcade Mode, which allows for a fully co-operative game for up to five players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Forgotten King, while itself a standalone game, is compatible with all previously published Super Dungeon Explore expansions and supplements._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

My Super Dungeon Explore: Forgotten King, Always Super Pledge. Buyer will be responsible for actual cost of shipping. If preferred, alternative shipping options will be considered.

This is the Kickstarter version, with several addons, opened and played once. Included: Main Kickstarter version of the game in box, with upgrade decks for Dragonback Peaks, Cavern of Roxor, and Von Drakk Manor. The Mistmourn Coast Monsters, Brave-Mode Candy, Never-Lost Cola, Royal Warden, 30 heart plastic tokens, 12 potion tokens, Wandering Minstrel, 6X Giri Creeps, Dark Heroes Upgrade Deck, Shadow-mode Candy, Pumpkin Patch Monsters, Kunoichi Candy, Ninja Cola and exclusive coloring book, giant metal Princess coin, and Booty Box (to hold everything in). Add-ons include DeepRoot Rider, Stilt town monsters and hero, Claws Wyrm monsters and hero, and Ghost House tiles (with Bones Creeps). The shipping is going to be ridiculous, with two large heavy boxes (assuming you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t want the boxes from the add-on stuff which would increase shipping, but I do still have if you want them. I estimate $50, but buyer will pay actual shipping to be refunded the difference if it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s less. I can supply pictures if needed.

This is a large bundle including the KS Always Super Pledge + some extras I bought (2 heroes and 3 Warbands) and also the original Super Dungeon Explore game. The buyer pays shipping**. Everything has been opened and punched, except for the 3 Warbands that I bought on the side, they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re still in shrink. The Forgotten King game has been played one time. The original SDE has been played 3 times. The minis with Original SDE had to be assembled, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not great at it, but they seem to be holding together. Complete Listing (I tried my best to list everything) The Forgotten King Box containing + 2 rulebooks – 1 for classic mode (overlord vs. heroes mode) and 1 for Arcade mode (full coop) + counters and cards needed for play + 6 double sided dungeon tiles + Minis: • 1 Dungeon Boss • 4 Heroes • 2 mini bosses • 2 Bramble Knight spawn points o 2 Grobbit Executioners o 4 Frog Knights o 8 Billmen • 2 paired Old-Growth Hollow spawn points o 1 Sprout o 1 King Sprout o 2 Wisps o 2 Turnipheads o 6 Mooks • 6 Rabid Squirrel Creeps • 5 treasure chests • 3 Booty Boos (mimic traps) + Extras: • 2 Minis: Brave-Mode Candy Hero and her pet Never-Lost Cola • Mistmourn Coast Warband: cards and minis: o 1 Mistmourn shaman hero o 1 mini-boss o 1 Mistmourn Chieftain o 2 Spirit Walkers o 2 Ghostfire Warriors o 2 spawn points o 2 Mist Hounds o 6 Sorrows • 1 Royal Warden Hero • 30 plastic heart tokens and 12 plastic potion tokens (repolace cardboard chits) • 1 Wandering Minstrel Hero • 6 Giri Creeps • Cards to use some SDE mini-bosses as heroes • Shadow-Mode Candy mini-boss • Kunoichi Candy ninja hero and mini-boss • Ninja Cola Ninja hero and mini-boss • Metal princess coin • And a WHOLE extra box to hold all the extras – looks like a mimic • 3 upgrade packs – upgrades the older SDE content to new rules ----------------------------------- Extra heros: Twilight Knight Hero Tabbybrook Mage Hero The Warbands are a little cheaper than Amazon. 12 less than MSRP – and bonus – they’ve never been opened: Claws of the Wyrm Warband o 1 Dragon blade hero o 1 Wyrm Claw Templar mini-boss o 2 Black Claw Assassins o 3 Claw Trainers o 6 Drake Hounds o 2 Claw Shrine spawing points Stilt Town Zombies Warband o 1 Zombie Survivor Marie-Claude Hero o 1 Gruesome George mini-boss o 1 Shamble Priest o 2 Pudges o 2 Prowlers o 6 Swampies o 2 Grabby House spawning points o 1 Mr. Bitey pet Emerald Valley Warband o 1 Silver Chevalier Hero o 1 Glimmerwing mini-boss o 2 Fungal Growth spawn points o 2 Kinoshroom o 4 Truffle Pigs o 8 Okoshroom Original Super Dungeon Explore + small plastic plano to hold the smaller minis **Shipping Note: This is a lot of stuff and some large boxes - the shipping cost will be significant. I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t even get a weight from the Forgotten King box - with all of the stuff in it it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s over the 5 lb limit on my postal scale.

Boxes have minor shelfwear. Inserts removed. No expansion boxes included, everything comes in the boxes for Forgotten King and the first edition base game box. The first edition set is glued nicely except the dragon boss has a few minor glue marks. All the sets are 1st edition versions, but the 2.0 upgrade stuff is included in the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;upgrade deck_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; expansion. (Cards won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t come sleeved, and tokens will come in bags instead of that small token case) Here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the full list of what comes in this lot: [thing=92190]Super Dungeon Explore 1st edition base game[/thing] [thing=138094]Super Dungeon Explore Von Drakk Manor[/thing] [thing=156548]Super Dungeon Explore Forgotten King[/thing] [thing=175474]Super Dungeon Explore Forgotten King: Upgrade Deck[/thing] [thing=124322]Super Dungeon Explore Caverns of Roxor[/thing] [thing=129598]Super Dungeon Explore Dragon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Clutch[/thing] [thing=124558]Super Dungeon Explore Fireflow Denizens[/thing] [thing=171712]Super Dungeon Explore Mistmourn Coast Warband[/thing] [thing=124556]Super Dungeon Explore Rock Top Gang[/thing] [thing=117753]Super Dungeon Explore Candy and Cola (metal promo)[/thing] [thing=181362]Super Dungeon Explore Brave Mode Candy[/thing] [thing=130297]Super Dungeon Explore Calico Kate[/thing] [thing=152376]Super Dungeon Explore Captain R[/thing] [thing=124566]Super Dungeon Explore Herald of Vulcanis[/thing] [thing=156337]Super Dungeon Explore Kaelly the Nether Strider[/thing] [thing=130926]Super Dungeon Explore Kasaro To[/thing] [thing=130927]Super Dungeon Explore Kisa[/thing] [thing=146628]Super Dungeon Explore Nyan Nyan[/thing] [thing=130925]Super Dungeon Explore One Shot[/thing] [thing=130296]Super Dungeon Explore Princess Malya[/thing] [thing=130928]Super Dungeon Explore Sebastian Cross[/thing] [thing=138769]Super Dungeon Explore Succubus Vandella[/thing] [thing=181599]Super Dungeon Explore Wandering Minstrel [/thing] Here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the pick of the Dragon mini with the glue. You can see the little white spot between his fingers and thumb towards the base. All the other minis are 100% fine. [ImageID=2783983] Other pictures of the whole lot: [imageid=2787719 medium] [floatleft][ImageID=2787718][/floatleft][ImageID=2787717] [floatleft][ImageID=2787716][/floatleft][ImageID=2787715] [floatleft][ImageID=2787714][/floatleft][ImageID=2787713] Approximate weight: 17lbs Approximate package size: 16x16x16 Mails from 10036 zip code.

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling my in-hand _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Always Super_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Kickstarter Pledge of Super Dungeon Explore: Forgotten Kingdom plus the Claws of the Wyrm Warband expansion. The Forgotten Kingdom base game and the Claws of the Wyrm Warband expansion come along with the Boo Booty Box which includes the following: - Mistmourn Coast Warband - Upgrade Deck Pack [new conversion cards for previous editions] - Brave Mode Candy _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Never-Lost Cola [Hero] - Wandering Minstrel Expansion [Hero] - Kunoichi Candy [Hero _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Mini-Boss] and Ninja Cola [Hero _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Mini-Boss] - Shadow-Mode Candy [Mini-Boss] - Royal Warden [Hero] - Dark Heroes Upgrade Pack [use mini-bosses as Heroes] - Pumpkin Patch figures - 6 Giri Creeps - Plastic Token Pack [30x plastic wound counters and 12x potion counters] - Metal Commemorative Princess Coin I opened and sorted the Forgotten Kingdom base game and Boo Booty Box to ensure that everything was present, but the game was not played. I also punched out the cardboard tokens. Everything in these boxes is intact except for the Crystalia Coloring Book which never came with the package! The Claws of the Wyrm Warband expansion is still in its original shrink wrap. The Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling will be covered by the buyer when the exact amount is calculated based on the buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s address. Please let me know if you want me to take pictures of the products. Thanks!
